LanguageData.MechAssembler.label: mech birther
LanguageData.MechAssembler.description: An automated fast-acting mechanoid gestator. It periodically births and deploys fresh mechanoids.
LanguageData.MechCapsule.label: mech capsule
LanguageData.MechCapsule.description: A mechanoid storage and deployment capsule. It can contain a number of mechanoids, ready to emerge and fight upon being awakened.
LanguageData.MechDropBeacon.label: mech drop beacon
LanguageData.MechDropBeacon.description: A mechanoid reinforcement drop beacon. When activated, it calls in a group of mechs to land in drop pods nearby.
